message:
That's good feedback, I'll put it on my list of things to do.

Sounds good! It's admittedly a bit early, but feel free to reach out at any point later on. I can always migrate your existing comments :-)

I created [an RSS feed](https://blog.welcomments.io/feed.xml) for you if you want to stay updated. Alternatively, I can reach out to you again when Welcomments goes into public beta and is more feature complete.

Thanks for the valuable feedback and have an amazing day!
